title: Noob question here
body:
Why do Krugs need to take forever to kill throughout the entire match?

Maybe the duplication into mini Krugs process could speed up as the game progresses until they instantly duplicate at a certain point mid-late game?

I just feel it's ridiculous when you can kill Drakes faster than Krugs.  Hell even Baron dies faster eventually.

replies.body: I think it was supposed to slow clear speeds for junglers that are already struggling in the jungle.
can confirm

{{champion:9}} 

RIOOOTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!
{{champion:203}}
The idea was to allow farm junglers to spend more time farming and rewarding them with extra XP.
are there any meta farm junglers?
{{champion:104}}
PLEASE NERF HIM I BEG YOU

They already took his cigar.

What more can riot do to him?
give his cigar back so his lungs get diseased

Wouldn't that just make him...

... more cancerous?

http://www.wowpng.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/thug-life-glasses-png-image-370x297.png
Take my fucking upvote...
He's playtest analyst, you should beg him to manipulate playtest result so that it looks like Graves has 200% winrate and they'll nerf him :^)
My bad. I'm so tired of banning him every time I can, I'm just desperate.

> [{quoted}](name=penguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z6WJOJPs,comment-id=000100000003,timestamp=2017-03-04T19:31:47.605+0000)
>
> {{champion:104}}

You just made a grave mistake

oh. I was under the impression that a "farm jungler" was someone that cleared well but sucked early. And I know that graves doesn't suck early...or at any point in the game actually. I played him for like the second time like a week ago and got a penta.
His teamfighting is actually pretty bad.
uhh...have you ever played against a graves? q and r and there's 2 people crippled at least.
I've actually been playing Graves myself recently, and while he's good at making picks, he is not good at teamfighting.
Yeah, that's just not true dude.

Why does graves recieve special treatment with his knock back autos on monsters?
I feel if that was removed he would be a far more balanced jungler.
Besides he's already tanky enough to not kite monsters
Maybe still knock back small monsters, just not large ones?  That would make more sense thematically and hit his clear without gutting it.

That technically makes sense for {{champion:51}} headshots {{champion:119}} Q enhanced autos {{champion:222}} rockets {{champion:202}} as his weapon hits just as hard theoretically {{champion:133}} enhanced auto.
He doesn't need a knock back whatsoever. Kindred doesn't get one, has a mega nerfed heal, has low burst and is squishy af, yet was designed to jungle. 

He doesn't need it and never did. It was just a tacked on feature to ENSURE graves would succeed in the jungle. Why else would they do it to just him, and not the champions I listed?
helpful

> [{quoted}](name=penguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z6WJOJPs,comment-id=000100000003,timestamp=2017-03-04T19:31:47.605+0000)
>
> {{champion:104}}

Holy shit I've never seen a Rito with a rank higher than plat 5. I give my virtual claps to u. 
I de_stroyed meddler with urgod on my way up to diamond
Phreak? I rarely see rioters below plat.
Really? You guys change the entire jungle just because you made Graves too strong? Brilliant.

1 Camp =/= the entire Jungle

But still I see your point

{{champion:154}} {{item:3070}}

I haven't seen him in a while. He's being outshined by the Diver Jungler Trio. (Before you say Graves isn't a Diver, Graves is anything he wants to be because he can be Tanky, Bursty, Mobile all while playing checkers on the side.

> [{quoted}](name=Knoyle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z6WJOJPs,comment-id=00010000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-05T05:47:52.052+0000)

I totally agree Graves is the meta. Lethality Graves is a problem to everyone. But like Zac is real good in good hands too. Like Hecarim's fat brother.

{{champion:92}} Jungle or gtfo
Bronze meta is not the meta. Just because we may see them doesnt mean they are meta.
Welcome, to the wondrous world of {{champion:56}}

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z6WJOJPs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-04T16:27:50.588+0000)
>
> The idea was to allow farm junglers to spend more time farming and rewarding them with extra XP.

But we all know how that turned out, anyone with decent to fast clears can abuse krugs and be at level 3 when most lanes are barely level 2 allowing them to cheese gank bot lane repeatedly.
That got patched a while ago. The first Krugs don't grant extra XP from my understanding.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z6WJOJPs,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-03-05T06:37:29.723+0000)
>
> That got patched a while ago. The first Krugs don't grant extra XP from my understanding.

Yeah, it got patched some time back.
i try to always skip krugs. >.<
I love when my jungler stops doing Krugs after like 8 minutes when I'm red side top lane GP. Getting like 400 gold from a camp is pretty neat due to parley and barrels.
But they provide ALOT of gold.... learned that the hard way with {{champion:107}} counterjungling me there and taking mine, I've learned they are important.

I like Kruggs early cause it at least saves you from too much damage at once, and having some time to have your abilities back up, but late game, it's pointless to do Kruggs to me, since you one shot them, but sit there and wait for them to split.
I liked old Golems, 2 monsters means = not really single-target like Gromp and not really AOE-centered like wolves. It was perfect, why there was need to change, I honestly don't have a single clue..

> [{quoted}](name=SnowFall,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z6WJOJPs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-03-04T16:43:54.212+0000)
